pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena upāsakā bhikkhunisaṃghassa cīvaratthāya chandakaṃ saṅgharitvā aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.3: “amukassa, ayye, pāvārikassa ghare cīvaratthāya parikkhāro nikkhitto, tato cīvaraṃ āharāpetvā bhājethā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.4: Bhikkhuniyo tena parikkhārena bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.6: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.7: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.8: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.9: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.10: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.13: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.16: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.10: yaṃatthāya dinnaṃ, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.12: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.15: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.1: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.2: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.3: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
